title: [HOLD for payment 2024-10-25] [$250] [QBO] There is no option to enter credentials.
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to Workspace => Accounting.
2. Connect your workspace with QBO.
3. From QBO dashboard, disconnect Expensify App.
4. Go back to ND, click the menu from the Accounting page => Sync now.
5. Notice that's an error shows. Click threedot menu again, notice that you won't see `Enter credentials` option.

Expected result: If there's an authentication error, we should have `Enter credentials` option from three dot menu.

Actual result: None
